Keywords: Monster , Mystical , Sinister Syndicate
Real Name: Jason Macendale
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
PUMPKIN BOMBS: Hobgoblin may start the game with [SVC] #s001 Pumpkin Bombs equipped (at no cost).
YET ANOTHER SINISTER SIX: Adjacent friendly characters with the Sinister Syndicate keyword can use Blades/Claws/Fangs.
I CAN SMELL YOUR SINS: Once per turn when an opposing character hits, you may give that opposing character a Sin token. // Characters with Sin tokens can't use Shape Change, and Hobgoblin has "FREE: Make an attack, but only to target characters with Sin tokens." // When a character with a Sin token clears action tokens, they may remove 1 of their Sin tokens.
